story:
*English text will follow*

Jeune pianiste de talent

Sandrine Murengerantwali est une pianiste classique de nationalités Rwando-canadienne de 18 ans. Elle a commencé son apprentissage du piano à l’âge de 8 ans après avoir immigré au Canada avec ses parents. Sandrine a été la toute première à pouvoir donner un récital de fin d'année au terme de ses études au Collège Villa-Maria, qui existe maintenant depuis plus de 159 années.  

Pendant ses dix années de formation, Sandrine a remporté plusieurs prix et bourses dont deux médailles d’or au concours Marcelle-Corneille (2013-2014), le prix spécial d’excellence au gala Résonnance de Villa-Maria, la bourse complète de Vincent-d’Indy (Jean-de-Brébeuf), la bourse du collège Marianopolis et la bourse Savoie de Villa-Maria.

Récemment, Sandrine a décidé d’utiliser ses talents de pianiste afin d’aider sa communauté.

Malformation cardiaque

À sa naissance, Sandrine souffrait du CIV (Communication Interventriculaire), une malformation cardiaque nuisant grandement à la croissance d’un enfant. Heureusement, grâce à l'employeur de son père, Sandrine a eu la chance de bénéficier d'une opération chirurgicale au Kenya, seul traitement  pour sauver sa vie. 

Aujourd'hui au Rwanda, le pays d'origine de Sandrine, 2000 enfants attendent sans délais une opération cardiaque, 10 000 sont atteints du CIV et demeurent sans diagnostic, une centaine bénéficient chaque année d'une opération par les cardiologues de TEAMHEART (la fondation américaine dépêchant ses médecins sur place deux fois par année) et 20 enfants sont envoyés annuellement vers le Soudan, l'Égypte ou l'Israël afin d'y être opérés d'urgence.

D'après TEAMHEART, 15 à 20 enfants sont dans le risque de mourir à chaque semaine s’ils ne sont pas opérés. C'est donc avec cette constatation amère que Sandrine a décidé de mettre sur pied une fondation, Vivo Cuore (Coeur Vif), afin d'intervenir auprès de ces enfants endurant aujourd’hui cette maladie qu’elle-même a dû combattre jusqu’à ses 4 ans.

Concert bénéfice et la fondation Vivo Cuore

À partir de cette campagne, Sandrine souhaite amasser 5000$ pour couvrir les dépenses liées à son premier récital qui aura lieu à L'Université Concordia (la location de la salle, les nécessités audio-visuelles et les frais afférents). 

L'idée de ce concert-bénéfice date de 4 ans lorsque Sandrine a commencé à se produire dans les  événements de son école, lors des graduations et autres événements importants.

 Depuis plus de 4 mois, Sandrine a constitué une équipe pour sa fondation. Cette dernière est formée de médecins, d’experts juridiques et financiers ainsi que des étudiants travaillant tous ensemble sur une base bénévole.

Impact

Sandrine souhaite amasser au moins 15 000$  chaque année, afin de pouvoir faire opérer 2 enfants. 

Merci pour votre appui!

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

* Nous fournissons des reçus d'impôts.

**CONCERT: Janvier 2015 !!

 

__________________________________________________________________________

*English text:
YOUNG TALENTED PIANIST
Sandrine Murengerantwali is an 18 year-old Rwandan-Canadian and talented pianist. She began piano lessons at the age of 8 after her family migrated from Rwanda to Canada. 
In her 10-year career, Sandrine has won numerous music awards. 2 Gold Medals for the Marcel Corneille Piano Competition (2013, 2014), a special  Prize of Excellence in  2013 at GALA RÉSONNANCE Villa Maria. She also won full scholarships from Vincent d’Indy  (Jean de Brebeuf),  Marianopolis and Villa Maria’s Savoie. In Villa Maria's 159 years of existence, Sandrine made history by being the first student to ever produce a recital before graduating from high school.
Recently, Sandrine decided to use her piano talent to give back to her community.

HEART DISEASE 

Sandrine suffered from a heart disease at birth. Thanks to her father’s employment, Sandrine was privileged to receive timely medical surgery at age 4. Her heart condition at the time, Ventricular Septal Defect  (VSD), is a malformation of the heart that requires expensive surgery to correct.

In Sandrine's country of origin, Rwanda, many children suffer from the same condition. Currently, 2 000 children are waiting for surgery. 10 000 children do not even know that they suffer from VSD. About 100 Children are operated in Rwanda every year by a team of cardiologists from TEAMHEART.  Approximately 20 children are also sent annually to Sudan, Egypt and Israel for surgery. Unfortunately, 15 to 20 children are currently in danger of dying every week if not operated. 

As there is limited funding for VSD corrective surgeries, Sandrine decided to set up THE VIVO CUORE FOUNDATION to raise money to help save children who suffer from VSD, a heart condition she endured until 4.

PIANO BENEFIT CONCERT & THE VIVO CUORE FOUNDATION

Through her newly-established VIVO CUORE FOUNDATION, Sandrine hopes to raise $5000 to go towards concert costs. Her piano concert will take at Concordia University. Renting the hall, audiovisuals and other costs will allow her to perform to over 580  people.

Her idea for a benefit foundation was conceived over a 4-year period when she performed to sold-out audiences at her former Villa Maria High School, graduation parties and other high profile ceremonies.

Over the past 4 months, Sandrine constituted a team for her foundation. Her executive and board consist of a medical doctor, legal and community experts, financial professionals and students - all of whom work on pro bono/volunteer basis.

IMPACT

Sandrine hopes to raise over $15 000 every year to help pay surgery costs for 2 children in Rwanda.

Thank you for your support!

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

*We provide tax receipts!

**Concert: January 2015 !!
story_txt:
*English text will follow*

Jeune pianiste de talent
Sandrine Murengerantwali est une pianiste classique de nationalités Rwando-canadienne de 18 ans. Elle a commencé son apprentissage du piano à l’âge de 8 ans après avoir immigré au Canada avec ses parents. Sandrine a été la toute première à pouvoir donner un récital de fin d'année au terme de ses études au Collège Villa-Maria, qui existe maintenant depuis plus de 159 années.  
Pendant ses dix années de
formation, Sandrine a remporté plusieurs prix et bourses dont deux médailles
d’or au concours Marcelle-Corneille (2013-2014), le prix spécial d’excellence
au gala Résonnance de Villa-Maria, la
bourse complète de Vincent-d’Indy (Jean-de-Brébeuf), la bourse du collège
Marianopolis et la bourse Savoie de Villa-Maria.
Récemment, Sandrine a décidé d’utiliser
ses talents de pianiste afin d’aider sa communauté.


Malformation cardiaque
À sa naissance, Sandrine souffrait du CIV (Communication
Interventriculaire), une malformation cardiaque nuisant grandement à la
croissance d’un enfant. Heureusement, grâce à
l'employeur de son père, Sandrine a eu la chance de bénéficier d'une opération
chirurgicale au Kenya, seul traitement 
pour sauver sa vie. 
Aujourd'hui au
Rwanda, le pays d'origine de Sandrine, 2000 enfants attendent sans délais une
opération cardiaque, 10 000 sont atteints du CIV et demeurent sans diagnostic,
une centaine bénéficient chaque année d'une opération par les cardiologues de
TEAMHEART (la fondation américaine dépêchant ses médecins sur place
deux fois par année) et 20 enfants sont envoyés annuellement vers le Soudan,
l'Égypte ou l'Israël afin d'y être opérés d'urgence.
D'après
TEAMHEART, 15 à 20 enfants sont dans le risque de mourir à chaque
semaine s’ils ne sont pas opérés. C'est donc avec cette constatation amère
que Sandrine a décidé de mettre sur pied une fondation, Vivo Cuore (Coeur Vif),
afin d'intervenir auprès de ces enfants endurant aujourd’hui cette maladie
qu’elle-même a dû combattre jusqu’à ses 4 ans.
Concert bénéfice et la fondation
Vivo Cuore
À partir de cette
campagne, Sandrine souhaite amasser 5000$ pour couvrir les dépenses liées à son
premier récital qui aura lieu à L'Université Concordia (la location de la salle, les nécessités audio-visuelles et les frais
afférents). 
L'idée de ce
concert-bénéfice date de 4 ans lorsque Sandrine a commencé à se produire
dans les  événements de son école, lors des graduations et autres
événements importants.
 Depuis plus de 4
mois, Sandrine a constitué une équipe pour sa fondation. Cette dernière est
formée de médecins, d’experts juridiques et financiers ainsi que des
étudiants travaillant tous ensemble sur une base bénévole.
Impact
Sandrine souhaite amasser au moins 15 000$  chaque année, afin de
pouvoir faire opérer 2 enfants. 
Merci pour votre appui!
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
* Nous fournissons des reçus d'impôts.
**CONCERT: Janvier 2015 !!
 


__________________________________________________________________________
*English text:

YOUNG TALENTED PIANIST

Sandrine Murengerantwali is an 18 year-old Rwandan-Canadian and talented pianist. She
began piano lessons at the age of 8 after her family migrated from Rwanda
to Canada. 

In her
10-year career, Sandrine has won numerous music awards. 2 Gold Medals for the Marcel Corneille Piano Competition (2013, 2014), a special  Prize of Excellence in  2013 at GALA RÉSONNANCE Villa Maria. She also won full scholarships from Vincent
d’Indy  (Jean de Brebeuf),  Marianopolis and Villa
Maria’s Savoie. In Villa Maria's 159 years of existence, Sandrine made history by being the first student to ever produce a recital before graduating from high school.Recently, Sandrine decided to use her piano
talent to give back to her community.

HEART DISEASE Sandrine
suffered from a heart disease at birth. Thanks to her
father’s employment, Sandrine was privileged to receive timely medical
surgery at age 4. Her heart condition at the time, Ventricular Septal
Defect  (VSD), is a malformation of the
heart that requires expensive surgery to correct.In Sandrine's
country of origin, Rwanda, many children suffer from the same condition. Currently, 2 000 children are waiting for surgery. 10 000 children do not even know that they suffer
from VSD. About 100 Children are operated in
Rwanda every year by a team of cardiologists from TEAMHEART.  Approximately 20 children are also sent annually to Sudan, Egypt and Israel for surgery. Unfortunately, 15 to 20 children are currently in danger of dying every week if not
operated. As there is limited funding for VSD corrective surgeries, Sandrine
decided to set up THE VIVO CUORE FOUNDATION to raise money to help save
children who suffer from VSD, a heart condition she endured until 4.PIANO BENEFIT CONCERT & THE VIVO CUORE FOUNDATIONThrough her
newly-established VIVO CUORE FOUNDATION, Sandrine hopes to raise $5000 to go
towards concert costs. Her piano concert will take at
Concordia University. Renting the hall,
audiovisuals and other costs will allow her to perform to over 580  people.Her idea
for a benefit foundation was conceived over a 4-year period when she performed
to sold-out audiences at her former Villa Maria High School,
graduation parties and other high profile ceremonies.Over the
past 4 months, Sandrine constituted a team for her foundation. Her
executive and board consist of a medical doctor, legal and community experts,
financial professionals and students - all of whom work on pro bono/volunteer
basis.IMPACTSandrine hopes to raise over $15 000 every year to help pay surgery costs for 2 children in Rwanda.Thank you for your support!--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*We provide tax receipts!**Concert: January 2015 !!

story:
Floodlove (ex-member of The Dangerous Summer) is doing a "PAY WHAT YOU WANT" pre order through Indiegogo. If you enjoyed the first single, “Kelsey”, then we are looking for YOUR help to make the rest of this album happen. ANY amount you donate will get you the FULL ALBUM (digitally) once it is released, and the first single, “Kelsey”, immediately upon pledging.

Recording for the rest of the album is already under way, but it won’t be able to be mixed & mastered without your help. We have a very talented team working on this project from start to finish. With the vision of the whole team combined with all of your support and contributions, we will have a great finished product to be proud to present to you soon!

We are looking to have this album finished by the end of August so that we can release it in early fall, when we will begin touring to promote it. We hope to see you out on the road.

ANYONE WHO DONATES WILL HAVE THEIR NAME PRINTED IN THE ALBUM THANK YOUS as a small token of our gratitude for your help in making this project a success.

Please spread the word and the campaign to your friends, and again, thank you for your continued support.


*NOTE: If you have already contributed to the initial campaign, you will still be receiving the perk that you claimed, as promised. This campaign DOES NOT override the first campaign, however you may pledge again if an additional perk interests you.

story:
Short Summary:


  • My name is Em Harriss, singer/songwriter based out of Ashland, Oregon.
  • I have a very weird and active imagination, and music is really the only outlet I have to bring those thoughts and stories out into the world. 
  • With your support I will be able to produce this music properly, so you can hear these songs exactly how I hear them in my head.



Breakdown of Funds:


  • Studio costs
  • Production
  • Engineering
  • Mastering
  • Mixing

If I do not reach my goal, then I will use the amount of money raised, to produce a fan favorite single "Cops Came"...And if i go over my goal, that just means extra music on the Year: 2277 EP!


Hear My Voice!




Other Ways You Can Help!


  • Even if you can't contribute, you can help out by sharing this page with your friends and family and making some noise about the campaign!

I will forever appreciate your support! #TeamEm

XOXO -Em Harriss

story:
welcome to the official crowd funding page to my upcoming video debut-album. 

it's going to be called "the beautiful anomaly" . This project was created to give an audience craving for quality art or music to call their own.

The album is when successfully funded going to be released on customized mp3 stick featuring the album tracks in Highest possible resolution and the full Musicvideos to go along share and enjoy.

We are at the same time proud and a tiny bit overwhelmed, not because we don't have Trust in our abbilities as Artist's but because it does take some financial Groundwork to be able to make something like this happen.

So in short this Project is about building the art we want to see,or to build a frame where exceptional things can happen ..

story:
OOTober!
Opera on Tap Appreciation Month.

Opera was once pop music, an art form for the people. Opera was where people went to be seen, entertained, titillated, challenged and awestruck. Operas, at their height, were a combination of a red carpet movie premier and monster truck rally!

My name is Damien Elwood. I am the Managing Divo for Opera on Tap Los Angeles. I head a brave troupe of highly trained and supremely talented musicians who are committed to returning Opera to the People!

Opera on Tap Los Angeles is one of over a dozen chapters across the country that, along with the founding chapter in New York City, are joining together to turn October into OOTober! Opera on Tap Appreciation Month. Our intention is to raise $15,000 nationwide to support our singers and pianists who donate their time fighting the good fight bringing Opera back to the people one aria at a time. 

Our Goal is to Raise $2,500!

  • That's $10 from 250 people
  • or $25 from 100 people
  • or $2,500 from Placido Domingo, or someone like that. 
Where will this money go?
  • $1000 will go to pay our FABULOUS pianists.
  • $250 will go to cover PR and printing costs.  
  • and $1,250 will be sent back to the OOT mothership in NYC to support the ongoing dream of bringing opera back to the people EVERYWHERE. 

We're Important, Damn It, and Here's Why 

  • Opera on Tap provides informal singing opportunities for classical singers allowing them to work on their craft in a relaxing, supportive and, dare we say it, FUN environment.  
  • Opera on Tap Los Angeles alone has performed over 150 of classical music's best arias and songs in bars and rock clubs! That's 150 of the greatest pieces of music ever written made accessible to people who are only used to hearing opera sell cars and pizza in commercials. 
  • Opera on Tap works with composers helping them workshop and premier new works. Some of the money raised will be allocated to helping these new works tour Opera on Tap chapters across the nation. 
  • Finally, Opera on Tap demystifies Opera by sharing it in an intimate, visceral format. Not enough people have felt their toes vibrate and heart quicken when a highly trained, powerful vocal artist sings to them mere feet away while looking them in the eyes.
This is what bringing Opera to the people is all about!

Other Ways You Can Help

Can't donate just now? We totally understand. Here are some other ways you can help.  

  • Come to our Annual Halloween Party Show! October 27th, 6pm, Room 5 Lounge. It's going to be great! No body gets freaky for Halloween like opera singers. 
  • Send us an email and join our contact list so we can keep you up with all things OOTLA.
  • Like us on Facebook: www.facebook.com/OOTLA


www.operaontap.org - losangeles@operaontap.org - 310-836-1559

story:
THE WORLD FORGIVENESS PROJECT:

My name is Steve Robertson and I am the founder/CEO of Project Peace on Earth, LLC. (PPOE).  I have dedicated my life to helping create world peace. I am also the creator and Executive Director of Project Peace On Earth's (PPOE) the World Forgiveness Project scheduled for this Christmas Day, December 2013 from Bethlehem. 

THE PROJECT PEACE ON EARTH (PPOE)  MISSION: is to harness the power of sacred/inspirational music and then broadcast it worldwide from sacred sites in order to inform and empower more compassionate, loving and wise thought processes.  We are focusing our peace initiatives within the Middle East, and specifically, the Palestinian / Israeli area of conflict.


Can there be a more important place to bring about a lasting peace than to the Middle East Palestinian / Israeli conflict?

THE POWER OF MUSIC: 

Why sacred music so important?  Why will it make a difference? “People say that the soul on hearing the song of creation entered the body but, in reality, the soul itself was the song…Music should be healing, music should uplift the soul, music should inspire; then there is no better way of getting closer to God, of rising higher towards the spirit, if only the music is rightly understood."  The great 14th Century Sufi Master Hazrat Inayat Khan, in his book "The Mysticism of Sound and Music" – considered by many to be the bible on music.

We believe that sacred music has the power to inform a new spiritual awareness within the heart and mind of its listeners.  Such new thought processes can lead to greater personal and collective states of inner peace, compassion, forgiveness and love so that outer peace is made more possible and real. 

“All that we are is a result of what we have thought” – Buddha

“The ancestor of every action is thought.” – Emerson

“As a man (“Man” – a Sanskrit word for Consciousness) thinketh in his heart, so is he.” King Solomon, the Bible. 

PERSONAL FORGIVENESS GLOBAL IMPACT: 

A global social-media campaign encourages people worldwide to submit forgiveness messages via The World Forgiveness Project Facebook page:

- Photos of loved ones over whom individuals are suffering a loss and/or want to forgive - Art and Poetry - Written lists of judgments, grievances, heartbreak and/or anger towards other people, institutions that they are choosing to forgive, release and heal.

Palestinian Forgiveness Ambassadors place forgiveness messages received from around the world on the Art Structure:

Ambassadors are video taped as they acknowledge, read and document each message of forgiveness. - Musicians inspire and empower the Forgiveness Structure building process and placement of messages. - Native American elders and Spiritual Leaders help facilitate the ritual healing and cleansing of each thought-divide. (Navajo and Hopi elders have already confirmed their support and participation in this ceremony).

"Steve Robertson is the quintessential global peacemaker." - Caroline Myss, National Best Selling author, Anatomy of the Spirit. 

THE WORLD FORGIVENESS CEREMONY

At Dusk, the “Art of Forgiveness” structure now covered with: photos, art, poetry and lists of wounded thoughts is readied for the fiery release of wounded and judgmental thoughts so as to empower a new transformational beginning of greater love.   Palestinians, and others who have traveled from around the world, surround the “Art of Forgiveness” structure. People cry out and choose release and forgive. 

WORLDWIDE IMPACT

Your contribution will empower over a 100 million viewers to partake in a united opportunity to forgive and live in greater love.   People from around the globe will watch Bethlehem’s televised and webcast star-studded inspirational concert. 

As the last note of the Bethlehem concert crescendos, and simultaneous broadcast feed then switches live to Gaza.  

Here, the world now watches the fiery ceremonial release of forgiveness as an art structure is ignited and burns to the ground while.  Here, some 1000 people, each holding a light for peace, gather to form the words “Forgive All”.  

BROADCAST/WEBCAST

Video walls connect the audiences at the Gaza Ceremony and Bethlehem Concert. From orbiting space, a special satellite brings to the world, the ceremony from Gaza.

Satellite imagery captures the moment of our world united in Forgiveness and open to new possibilities of love.

"Robertson does not merely write about a vision of peace and personal empowerment, but he has lived it on the world stage.    Robertson is a living avatar on whose shining example our future may depend." - Larry Dossey, MD - New York Times bestseller HEALING WORDS: THE POWER OF PRAYER.

WHAT THE PRODUCTION COSTS:

$920,000 USD

Production Scope and Overview Assumptions:

10 Musical Acts paid stipend performance fee - group/favored nations of $10K each, Air-Business Class, Hotel, Ground Transport, Insurance, Food/per diem, Security, Production Teams – Concert, Ceremony, Broadcast, Documentary, Staging - Primary Bethlehem Concert and World Forgiveness Ceremony includes stage construction-sound-lighting packages, Forgiveness Ceremony Art structure, Broadcast cameras – Trucks and equipment, Documentary Film team, Post Production/Editing – Broadcast and Documentary, PR/Social Media team and campaign and Indiegogo/Paypal fees. 

*** Assumes ALL potential in-kind sponsorship costs (Air, hotel, grnd transport, food, etc) are purchased at hard cost pricing.  Obvious cost reductions occur with in-kind Sponsorship off-sets. 

"Diane and I have known Steve Robertson for many years.  We deeply respect, appreciate and support his important international peace work and sacred music concerts.  - Gerald  (Jerry) Jampolsky, M.D. and Diane Cirincione, PH.D.; Best Selling Authors and Speakers.  Founders of International Center for Attitudinal Healing.  Authors of " A MINI COURSE FOR LIFE." 

IF WE DON'T REACH FUNDING GOAL:

If for any reason we do not reach our entire funding goal we will simply rescale the production to meet the scope of what funds we have received. In such a case, we will first begin by reducing the number of musicians we fly into the live events.  Instead, we will either beam them in via a live broadcast/webcast or plug in a pre-recorded performance from the talent into the live broadcast feed.  We have a successful track record of accomplishing such, plan B and C’s, scenarios.

BACKGROUND EXPERIENCE OF SUCCESS!!!

Over the past several years and over the course of Project Peace On Earth’s work in Palestine, I  have developed deep working relationships with the Palestine Government and Private Sector leadership: Mayor Vera Baboun of Bethlehem, Governor Abdel Fattah Hamayel, Honorable Rula Ma’ayah (present) and Khuloud&nbs

talent into the live broadcast feed.  We have a successful track record of
accomplishing such, plan B and C’s, scenarios.



BACKGROUND EXPERIENCE OF SUCCESS!!!











Over the past several years and over the course of Project Peace On Earth’s work in Palestine, I  have developed deep working relationships with the Palestine Government and Private Sector leadership: Mayor Vera Baboun of Bethlehem, Governor Abdel Fattah Hamayel, Honorable Rula Ma’ayah (present) and Khuloud&nbs

story:
My name is Aleks and exactly 1 year ago I was successful programmer in World’s one of the largest IT corporations – Accenture. 

Today I will tell the story of the short life of the programmer, who considered himself an Artist, and life - an incredible program, and who has managed to change their attitude towards life.

Every day, we come to our workplace, do some work, getting at the end of the month money. Everything is repeated each next months; birthday’s flash like the beautiful views while driving at full-speed train called life.

I am coming from authentic city, namely Riga, which is on the north-east of Europe. And most of the conscious years I’ve spent there. I’m 23. After following pattern of ‘diligent kid’, further ‘diligent pupil’ and later ‘diligent student’, I step into a new “amazing, brand new” pattern that also starts from letter ‘d’ – ‘diligent employee’.

Personality development occurs in a particular social circle under the influence of parents, teachers, relatives, friends and acquaintances - in other words, those who are around us. Gradually, in the subconscious laid program, how to live "right", i.e. like most men of this circle.

Now I am in Stuttgart, that is on the south of Germany, opening You my deep feelings. For the past year one, exactly one word could describe why I am here – maverick.

Each day, while sitting in front of the computer and typing the keyboard, I was dreaming instead to touch the strings on the guitar, to have my own musical group - every night with electric guitar and a microphone to be the star of my small town.

I resigned from the corporation and decided to start a new period of my life in different place from scratch; decision fell on the State University of Music and Performing Arts Stuttgart. Currently I am waiting for the new fall semester, however, I don’t have enough resources for studies. And that’s where You are coming! I am wondering, if You would like to give me a little change for a chance!

MY STORY IN PICTURES.

The simple Math.

  • 200$ – administrative fee in university (http://www.mh-stuttgart.de/en/home/).
  • 499$ – guitar for "Bachelor of Guitar" studies (http://www.fender.com/guitars/telecaster/vintag...).

DREAM BIG.

Indiegogo is a legitimate way to support individuality that you are interested in developing...almost as if you are their manager. All those times you think to yourself "When is he going to come out with something new or come perform in my city?" Well this is your opportunity to make that happen.

I need Your help, so please spread the word. Post about the Indiegogo on Twitter, Facebook, Instagram, call your friends, tell your parents, tell the president!
WE CAN DO THIS TOGETHER.

story:
A few years ago, Lisa Rosinsky and I hatched a plot to create music for her words. This year, Colin Read made it happen.

He set Lisa's "Fairytales and Letters" to music and I premiered it with Bethany Pietroniro at the piano.  We adorned the room in nature photography by Jon Barrows. It was a glorious celebration of art, artists, love, and spring.


The full program that evening included other works by Argento, Strauss, and Ravel, that explored the themes of this poetry in meaningful ways.

It was so successful as a program that many suggested we record it.

So, we're recording it and releasing it independently, with album art featuring the photography of Jon Barrows, the poetry of Lisa Rosinsky, and Danielle's personally written program notes.

Danielle: "New music, and multimedia projects, are close to my heart, because I think we can learn a lot from combined perspectives.  New music teaches us about old music -- helps us find it relevant and fresh.  Art helps us see music, and music helps us hear poetry."

The project has always existed in a collaborative spirit: its creation and its energy has come from our family, friends, and colleagues.

Now is your chance to be a part of this project.  We want to make this album so you can experience it too.

How it works

Donate $10 to pre-purchase your physical album (shipping not included, but hand-delivery is whenever possible). Add $1 if you'd also like a download code for the mp3 version.  After the campaign, the physical CD will be sold for $15 and the digital version for $8.99.  

Donate more and receive other, enriching items, like a book of program notes and poetry, signed scores, and artwork. All donors will be personally thanked with a handwritten card featuring the photography of Jon Barrows. Look for limited-time perks throughout the campaign.

Our budget is simple:

Recording costs (including licenses, production costs, studio time): 1,300

CD production, distribution: 1,500

Promotional concerts: 300

Associated expenses (indiegogo fees, website support, graphic design): 250

Contingency Fund: 250

Total: 3,600

Other income will come from grants pending.

A run of 300 CDs means that at $10, you are buying your CD slightly below at-cost with all expenses considered.  This is a great way for us to have the funds to make it happen, and you to benefit from your contribution as well. We hope this helps in your decision to pre-purchase the album.


In sum...

$10 gets you your album and assures its production.

More gets you perks that will enrich your listening experience.

And no matter what support you can offer, we are sincerely grateful.

Besides donating now and purchasing your album, you can:

- attend a concert and show your support.

- help us promote our activities. Share the campaign! Tell your friends! Share on Facebook, Twitter and so on: it's so valuable to us if you pass the word on.

- Stay in touch! Follow me on  facebook for information about concerts and updates as the project progresses.  Join the mailing list to get periodic emails about this project and future activities.

I hope you'll consider participating in Songs of Innocence and Experience - in whatever way you can. Thank you -- and we'll keep you posted as the project unfolds.

story:
Short Summary

If you are here it's because you either love SAVANT's music or you love videos by Mike Diva.

Imagine if we could get both of them together to make a video for this track:

Mike Diva: 

 

PLUS SAVANT:

 

= AWESOME!

What We Need & What You Get

We need this video to be amazing so we want to make sure Mr. Diva has more than he needs to make every SAVANT fan on earth happy. Let me break it down for you:

  • $5,000 - $8,000 will be used on cast and costumes
  • $3,000 - $5,000 will be used for set and location
  • Every other penny will be used on EFFECTS and other awesomeness

To make it worth it we are packing up some awesome perks to those of you that donate over a certain level. The big prize? We will fly you and a friend to a SAVANT gig so we can hang out with you and have a blast.

Broke?

That's cool with us because there you can help us by showing this to your friends and getting them on board.

Share this page!

story:
About Rio: 

As a producer, singer, and songwriter working primarily with hip-hop and popular music, Rio stands alone in what is also known as the Country Music Capital of the world, Nashville, TN. His musical style is soulfully infused with a pop twist that only he can create. His sound is notorious for combining deep, hard-hitting baselines reminiscent of the southern rap songs with soothing, graceful melodies.
 
Rio’s early work with various gospel groups would even garner him a Dove nomination. After moving on from gospel music, Rio’s library came to house everything from Electro / Hop tunes such as the title track “Good Morning, Dreamer” to the smokey but driven “Sex and Sativa.”

Help Send Rio to NXNE in Toronto, Canada

  • Money raised in this campaign will go to fund flights, lodging, and networking opportunities for Rio and his band
  • By donating to send Rio to NXNE, you will not only help further his artistic career, you will ensure that the city of Nashville is represented well in a major music festival.

Your funds not only help Rio reach his goals, but he also will turn around and offer free listening sessions for the next project, studio parties, private shows, and signed hard copy CDs to fall in line with each specific donation.

The Impact

  • This campaign is designed to take one of Nashville's most recognized independent artists and put him on an international stage.
  • Travelling to Toronto is about more than the music. Rio plans to use excess funds to meet and network with other industry professionals at the festival and work towards further business opportunities.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Time is short, so please help spread the word about this campaign by posting it on your Facebook, Twitter, and other social media.
  • Use Indiegogo's share tools to point people towards this specific campaign

Thank you so much for your help, and be on the lookout for Rio in Toronto.

story:
Help fund Tumbleweed Company's new album!

Tumbleweed Company started with a couple of friends who wanted to play music together. Fast forward 4 years of playing around the country and writing songs together, and now we've been given a huge opportunity to record an album with Ken Coomer, an incredible producer and the former drummer of one of our favorite bands, Wilco.

Over the time we've been together as a band we've had over 40 songs that we've written but haven't had the right opportunity to record in the right studio, with the right people. This campaign is to try and fund our album, but will also be helping us realize a huge dream, so THANK YOU!

How your money is being invested:

The album itself: recording time, engineers, producing, and mixing  - $5,000  

Printing the album on CD's and Vinyl - $600 for 500 CD's, $1300 for 300 Vinyl

Packaging and delivering your rewards for donating - $600

- Any money that we happen to make beyond our goal will be put towards more studio time and more songs on the album

If you can't donate, share!

We understand that some people interested in getting involved may not be able to donate much, but if that's the case even sharing the video with friends and family will be a huge help! Thank you to everyone who has supported us over the years and thank you in advance to those who have contributed/shared! We can't wait to share the final product with you!

story:
“She’s got a nice mix of Norah Jones and Lauryn Hill thing going, but it’s all Jurni Rayne”“[And] if you haven’t seen or heard her before, then we highly recommend checking her out…”

First, I want to thank you for taking the time to read this letter. I am coming to you today asking for your assistance. In an age of a multi-million dollar music industry, perhaps you have wondered how a small independent musician/recording artist like me can compete. Well, this letter is exactly what it’s all about! Meaning someone like me, asking someone like you for financial assistance. Because I have been so determined to complete this project, I have exhausted my personal funding and I am now asking for your help in this endeavor.  Your donation WILL make a difference.  I am asking for a $1000. Below is a budget list showing the upcoming expenses that I am incurring, so you will have a better understanding of what you are contributing to.  I need your assistance to complete this ASAP, so please invest today!

What you are donating toward:
1. Studio Recording Time ($30/hr)
2. Live instrumentation on the recording ($500)
3. Mixing and Mastering ($150/per song)
4. Graphic Design for CD cover ($75)
5. Digital Distribution via tunecore ($60)
6. Physical CD copies ($500)

As a result of my dedication, I have already begun recording in the studio, where my album, “Jurni Rayne: Finding My Way”, is almost complete. I have completed photo shoots for the album cover, website, and promotional material.  I have also performed in various places to get my name known in the area and have been invited to perform for future events as well.

Once my album is complete, it will be available for purchase from me personally, on my website, www.jurnirayne.com, GooglePlay, itunes, amazon, Spotify, and many other online distribution sites.  I welcome the opportunity to speak with you and provide any additional information about Jurni Rayne. Please contact me via facebook (Jurni Rayne), twitter (@jurnirayne) or email: jurni@jurnirayne.com.  At this juncture, your support is critical, and very much appreciated. Thank you.

 Sincerely,

Jurni Rayne

story:
(En español, por favor vaya a la parte inferior)

Hi,  I’m Kim Manning. I am a singer-songwriter and that roller-skating songstress from George Clinton and the P-Funk All-Stars. I’ve also been on TV as Peachez in Flavor of Love and released a couple of solo albums. Metamorphosing once again, I bring a new project in three dimensions “Space Queen”.


“Space Queen” is my inner warrior.  Music that reaches into the electronic world with the pop tinged productions of Billy Triplett, yet maintains the soulful touch of a funkateer. “Space Queen” is a CD with a 3D experience. Each album comes with a pair of 3D glasses so that you can admire the 3D artwork and watch the 3D videos. Check out this cool 3D picture below!



These songs are so important to me because they represent where I was, the tribulations I have concurred, and the spirit and artist that I am becoming. I wrote and recorded the songs at the Holiday Music Motel in 2012 with the late Billy Triplett.  Early this year we added members of Parliment-Funkadelic to the recordings. Billy passed away this August while finishing the mixes. He was a magician, and I am releasing "Space Queen"  in his honor. 

In order to complete this dream, I need to raise $10,000. These funds will be used to pay for mixing, mastering, CD pressing, videos, promotion, and musicians. This is your chance to join the mission.

I have lots of amazing new perks to offer in exchange for donations of any amount, from CD's to calendars and hardcopy books.  You can see them all on the right hand side. 

 I believe in the power of you my fans, friends, and loved ones. 1 by 1 we can do it. 



Everybody can help by sharing this campaign on facebook and twitter.  Use the handy Indiegogo tools below to share it everywhere.

Musicians involved with this project are producer Billy Triplett, members of Parliament-Funkadelic (Benny Cowen, Greg Thomas, Jerome Rodgers, Jeff Bunn, Richy "Shakin" Nagan, Maruga, Marshall and Garrett Shider), as well as Steel Bridge Song Fest artists (Meaghan Owens, Pat MacDonald, Melanie Jane, Early Thomas, Landon Capelle, Mike Bleck, and Craig McCelland). Additionally visual artists photographer Adrienn Recio, videographer Matt Willson, designer Robin Banks, and body paint artist Malcolm Stuart created the graphics and 3D video. 

Here's a picture of indiegogo exclusive photo books!


Here's a breakdown of the Budget:

2,000 printing of CD’s and 3D glasses

1,800 mastering, mixes, and musicians

3,000 promotion and marketing

500 CD artwork, photos, and make-up

1,000 custom perks and t-shirts

100 poster printing

500 video budget

400 shipping and handing for perks

700 campaign admin (Paypal and Indiegogo fees)

$10,000

I guarantee you will get your perks. If I do not make my fundraising goal I will cut the promotions budget. Each of the custom perks are made per order. If less are ordered then those budgets will naturally shrink as well.  I had a successful crowd-funding campaign with my last record “Good People” and am confident I can do it again.  

I promise that I will finish the project, keep you informed in the process, and ship out all the perks. 

Love and Light

Kim Manning


Want a sneak peak of the images for the Calendar? Here you go!





Here's some of what folks have said about me:

“A massive voice with powerful lyrics” - Relix Magazine, Josh Baron

“Funk Magic” 5 Stars - CD Baby, Nikki

“Power Singing” – Singer Magazine, G.T.

“Beautiful, Funky, and Unique” 5 Stars  – Skinnie Magazine

 Here's the T-shirt Design:


All video by Matt Willson, Leontrackstar. Additional images for Indiegogo campaign by William Theron and Teresa Young. Calendar Art by Sweet William, photo by Hilary Bader. Fireman video features: Robin Banks, Kate Havens, Jesselynn Desmond, Mark Highlove, Andrea Pazols, Tara Saylor, Leah Estella Abdenour,  Andrew A Soria, Sylvie Hitchcock, and Ian Burney. Song Clips for the Video are rough mixes for "Space Queen".  They include: "Space Queen" (Manning, Owens, Triplett), "Peace and Love" (Manning, Triplett), "Fireman" (Manning, Owens, Triplett, Macdonald, Bleck), and "LIfe is Good" (Manning, Triplett)

International shipping please add $10 to your donation.

Get the whole Kim Manning collection! 


Hola, soy Kim Manning. Yo soy un cantante, compositor y cantante que el patinaje sobre ruedas de George Clinton y el P- Funk All-Stars. También he estado en la televisión como Peachez en Flavor of Love y lanzó un par de álbumes en solitario . Metamorfosis , una vez más , les traigo un nuevo proyecto en tres dimensiones " Queen Espacio" .

"Reina del espacio" es mi guerrero interno . Música que llega al mundo de la electrónica con las producciones de pop con tintes de Billy Triplett , todavía mantiene el toque sentimental de un Funkateer . "Reina del espacio" es un CD con una experiencia en 3D . Cada álbum viene con un par de gafas 3D para que pueda admirar la obra de arte en 3D y ver los videos en 3D.

Estas canciones son tan importantes para mí porque representan donde estaba, las tribulaciones que he concurrido , y el espíritu y el artista que me estoy convirtiendo . Escribí y grabé las canciones en el Holiday Music Motel en 2012 con el fallecido Billy Triplett . A principios de este año hemos añadido los miembros del parlamento -Funkadelic a las grabaciones . Billy falleció este mes de agosto , mientras que el acabado de los mixes. Él era un mago, y estoy lanzando "Reina del espacio" en su honor.

Con el fin de completar este sueño , necesito recaudar $ 10.000. Estos fondos se utilizarán para pagar por mezcla, masterización , al presionar CD, vídeos, promoción y músicos. Esta es tu oportunidad de unirse a la misión.

Tengo un montón de increíbles nuevas ventajas para ofrecer a cambio de donaciones de cualquier cantidad , desde CDs a los calendarios y libros en papel . Puedes verlos todos en el lado derecho.

 Yo creo en el poder de ustedes mis fans , amigos y seres queridos. 1 por 1 podemos hacerlo .

Todo el mundo puede ayudar compartiendo esta campaña en facebook y twitter. Utilice las herramientas de IndieGoGo mano abajo para compartirlo por doquier .

Los músicos que participan en este proyecto son el productor Billy Triplett , los miembros del Parlamento -Funkadelic ( Benny Cowen , Greg Thomas , Jerome Rodgers, Jeff Bunn , Richy " Shakin " Nagan , Maruga , Marshall y Garrett Shider ) , así como artistas Steel Bridge Canción Fest ( Meaghan Owens, Pat MacDonald , Melanie Jane , Early Thomas , Landon Capelle, Mike Bleck , y Craig McCelland ) . Además artistas visuales fotógrafo Adrienn Recio , camarógrafo Matt Willson , diseñador Robin Banks, y el cuerpo del artista pintura Malcolm Stuart creó los gráficos y vídeo en 3D .

Aquí hay una foto de álbumes de fotos exclusivas IndieGoGo !


Te garantizo que obtendrá sus beneficios. Si yo no hago mi meta de recaudación voy a recortar el presupuesto de las promociones . Cada una de las ventajas personalizados están hechos por pedido. Si menos están clasificadas a continuación, los presupuestos se encogen naturalmente también. Tuve una exitosa campaña de crowdfunding con mi último disco " Good People " y estoy seguro de que puedo hacerlo de nuevo.

Te prometo que voy a terminar el proyecto , le mantiene informado en el proceso, y enviar hacia fuera todos los beneficios .


Amor y Luz

Kim Manning
story_txt:
(En español, por favor vaya a la parte inferior)Hi,  I’m Kim Manning. I am a singer-songwriter and that roller-skating songstress from George Clinton and the P-Funk All-Stars. I’ve also been on TV as Peachez in Flavor of Love and released a couple of solo albums. Metamorphosing once again, I bring a new project in three dimensions “Space Queen”.
“Space Queen” is my inner warrior.  Music that reaches into the electronic world with the pop tinged productions of Billy Triplett, yet maintains the soulful touch of a funkateer. “Space Queen” is a CD with a 3D experience. Each album comes with a pair of 3D glasses so that you can admire the 3D artwork and watch the 3D videos. Check out this cool 3D picture below!These songs are so important to me because they represent where I was, the tribulations I have concurred, and the spirit and artist that I am becoming. I wrote and recorded the songs at the Holiday Music Motel in 2012 with the late Billy Triplett.  Early this year we added members of Parliment-Funkadelic to the recordings. Billy passed away this August while finishing the mixes. He was a magician, and I am releasing "Space Queen"  in his honor. In order to complete this dream, I need to raise $10,000. These funds will be used to pay for mixing, mastering, CD pressing, videos, promotion, and musicians. This is your chance to join the mission.
I have lots of amazing new perks to offer in exchange for donations of any amount, from CD's to calendars and hardcopy books.  You can see them all on the right hand side. 
 I believe in the power of you my fans, friends, and loved ones. 1 by 1 we can do it. Everybody can help by sharing this campaign on facebook and twitter.  Use the handy Indiegogo tools below to share it everywhere.Musicians involved with this project are producer Billy Triplett, members of Parliament-Funkadelic (Benny Cowen, Greg Thomas, Jerome Rodgers, Jeff Bunn, Richy "Shakin" Nagan, Maruga, Marshall and Garrett Shider), as well as Steel Bridge Song Fest artists (Meaghan Owens, Pat MacDonald, Melanie Jane, Early Thomas, Landon Capelle, Mike Bleck, and Craig McCelland). Additionally visual artists photographer Adrienn Recio, videographer Matt Willson, designer Robin Banks, and body paint artist Malcolm Stuart created the graphics and 3D video. 
Here's a picture of indiegogo exclusive photo books!Here's a breakdown of the Budget:
2,000 printing of CD’s and 3D glasses
1,800 mastering, mixes, and musicians
3,000 promotion and marketing
500 CD artwork, photos, and make-up
1,000 custom perks and t-shirts
100 poster printing
500 video budget

400 shipping and handing for
perks
700 campaign admin (Paypal and Indiegogo fees)

$10,000
I guarantee you will get your perks. If I do not make my fundraising goal I will cut the promotions budget. Each of the custom perks are made per order. If less are ordered then those budgets will naturally shrink as well.  I had a successful crowd-funding campaign with my last record “Good People” and am confident I can do it again.  I promise that I will finish the project, keep you informed in the process, and ship out all the perks. 
Love and LightKim ManningWant a sneak peak of the images for the Calendar? Here you go!Here's some of what folks have said about me:
“A massive voice with powerful lyrics” - Relix Magazine,
Josh Baron
“Funk Magic” 5 Stars - CD Baby, Nikki
“Power Singing” – Singer Magazine, G.T.
“Beautiful, Funky, and Unique” 5 Stars  – Skinnie Magazine
 Here's the T-shirt Design:
All video by Matt Willson, Leontrackstar. Additional images for Indiegogo campaign by William Theron and Teresa Young. Calendar Art by Sweet William, photo by Hilary Bader. Fireman video features: Robin Banks, Kate Havens, Jesselynn Desmond, Mark Highlove, Andrea Pazols, Tara Saylor, Leah Estella Abdenour,  Andrew A Soria, Sylvie Hitchcock, and Ian Burney. Song Clips for the Video are rough mixes for "Space Queen".  They include: "Space Queen" (Manning, Owens, Triplett), "Peace and Love" (Manning, Triplett), "Fireman" (Manning, Owens, Triplett, Macdonald, Bleck), and "LIfe is Good" (Manning, Triplett)International shipping please add $10 to your donation.Get the whole Kim Manning collection! Hola, soy Kim Manning. Yo soy un cantante, compositor y cantante que el patinaje sobre ruedas de George Clinton y el P- Funk All-Stars. También he estado en la televisión como Peachez en Flavor of Love y lanzó un par de álbumes en solitario . Metamorfosis , una vez más , les traigo un nuevo proyecto en tres dimensiones " Queen Espacio" ."Reina del espacio" es mi guerrero interno . Música que llega al mundo de la electrónica con las producciones de pop con tintes de Billy Triplett , todavía mantiene el toque sentimental de un Funkateer . "Reina del espacio" es un CD con una experiencia en 3D . Cada álbum viene con un par de gafas 3D para que pueda admirar la obra de arte en 3D y ver los videos en 3D.Estas canciones son tan importantes para mí porque representan donde estaba, las tribulaciones que he concurrido , y el espíritu y el artista que me estoy convirtiendo . Escribí y grabé las canciones en el Holiday Music Motel en 2012 con el fallecido Billy Triplett . A principios de este año hemos añadido los miembros del parlamento -Funkadelic a las grabaciones . Billy falleció este mes de agosto , mientras que el acabado de los mixes. Él era un mago, y estoy lanzando "Reina del espacio" en su honor.Con el fin de completar este sueño , necesito recaudar $ 10.000. Estos fondos se utilizarán para pagar por mezcla, masterización , al presionar CD, vídeos, promoción y músicos. Esta es tu oportunidad de unirse a la misión.Tengo un montón de increíbles nuevas ventajas para ofrecer a cambio de donaciones de cualquier cantidad , desde CDs a los calendarios y libros en papel . Puedes verlos todos en el lado derecho. Yo creo en el poder de ustedes mis fans , amigos y seres queridos. 1 por 1 podemos hacerlo .Todo el mundo puede ayudar compartiendo esta campaña en facebook y twitter. Utilice las herramientas de IndieGoGo mano abajo para compartirlo por doquier .Los músicos que participan en este proyecto son el productor Billy Triplett , los miembros del Parlamento -Funkadelic ( Benny Cowen , Greg Thomas , Jerome Rodgers, Jeff Bunn , Richy " Shakin " Nagan , Maruga , Marshall y Garrett Shider ) , así como artistas Steel Bridge Canción Fest ( Meaghan Owens, Pat MacDonald , Melanie Jane , Early Thomas , Landon Capelle, Mike Bleck , y Craig McCelland ) . Además artistas visuales fotógrafo Adrienn Recio , camarógrafo Matt Willson , diseñador Robin Banks, y el cuerpo del artista pintura Malcolm Stuart creó los gráficos y vídeo en 3D .Aquí hay una foto de álbumes de fotos exclusivas IndieGoGo !Te garantizo que obtendrá sus beneficios. Si yo no hago mi meta de recaudación voy a recortar el presupuesto de las promociones . Cada una de las ventajas personalizados están hechos por pedido. Si menos están clasificadas a continuación, los presupuestos se encogen naturalmente también. Tuve una exitosa campaña de crowdfunding con mi último disco " Good People " y estoy seguro de que puedo hacerlo de nuevo.Te prometo que voy a terminar el proyecto , le mantiene informado en el proceso, y enviar hacia fuera todos los beneficios .Amor y LuzKim Manning

story:
Short Summary

     My name is Jake Vanderham. I'm a 20 year old actor and musician. After the untimely death of my father this past spring, I've been left picking up the pieces of my old family farm and trying to figure out how to save it. That's where the inspiration for Realway Studios began.

     First, I wanted to record an EP of my original music. My friend and colleague, Steafan Hannigan, offered to help with his expertise and recording equipment. Upon setting up the make shift studio in my living room, Steafan and I discovered the incredible potential that my farm possessed for recording music.

     After several late night sessions recording my EP, Realway Studios began to  expand beyond the DIY recording experience that it was. Word quickly spread about this up and coming studio and the quality of sound achieved garnered great acclaim from industry veterans. In Realway’s short history, it has provided recording services for 5 different projects; including one client from the UK.

In order to move to the next level, we need your help.

 What We Need 

     Phase one of my campaign is securing the ownership of my family farm. The funding is required to pay off the mortgage and buy out the remaining shareholders . After these funds have been acquired, I can continue establishing Realway Studios as a business and destination recording studio. 

     If my entire $360'000.00 goal is achieved, I would have full ownership of my farm again, allowing the business to grow without a crippling overhead deficit. I need your help urgently as the farm is currently for sale. If it receives a decent offer, unfortunately, the farm would sell, something that is out of my control. If, however, I receive the funding in time, I can buy the remaining shares and continue with this dream.

     The recording equipment has already been acquired, the space needs only minor adjustments to enhance its workability as a studio, and most importantly, musicians that have worked here want to come back. Julian Brown, bassist for Canadian musician "Feist" and Aubrey Dayle, one of Toronto’s most respected percussionists are a few that have fully experiecnced and enjoyed what Realway has to offer.

     The farm is a truly unique place. Situated in the heart of an environmentally protected area, the 88 acre estate is a haven for wildlife and nature. After recording a session, musicians can go for a swim in the small lake in front of the house, walk through the forest, or simply watch the stars from the old, wrap around cedar porch. Things you just can't do in a basement studio in the heart of a busy city. Realway offers inspiration and serenity to up and coming bands looking for the perfect place to record their next major record.

     Steafan Hannigan, recording engineer, has over 22 years of experience in acoustic music recording and is also a highly in demand session musician. He will be the resident studio engineer at Realway. He has recorded with the likes of: Bjork, Depeche Mode, Il Divo, Uriah Heep, and Loreena McKinnett to name a few. 

This wonderful space is also perfect for hosting workshops, with outbuildings and camping space (and eventually, festivals), and house concerts. Steafan and his wife, Saskia have been running workshops, festivals and teaching for a combined 50 years, mostly in the roots music scene. In the greater scheme, Realway will be used to further peoples musical schooling and provide a destination for quality education and international teachers.

The Impact

     If you support my project you will not only be supporting my dream, but also a community of artists trying bring their music to the world. After the expiration of his current contract, Steafan will be again, like many other talented Canadian musicians, out of work. Realway will offer employment to people like Steafan and other local session musicians, some of which are the most talented in the world. 

     In Cobourg and the surrounding area, there are countless musicians in need of work. The community itself is bubbling with up and coming musical talent. Located in close proximity with other major music cities such as Kingston, Peterborough, Toronto, Ottawa, Realway will become a hub for musical creation. 

    One question I've faced all along with this project is "With people making their own music at home with the amazing new technologies available today, why will anyone want to pay for studio time in this day and age?" The answer is that there will always be those artists who can't afford studio time and kudos to them for being able to do that on their own. However, any artists signed to a major label, or artists that can afford to make their first "professional album" will need the expertise and know how that a professional studio can offer. That on top of Realway's incredibly unique and inspirational setting is why we are confident that this project will fly. 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribue financially, please spread the word. People who love great music and respect and support the artists that make it will want to get on board with a project like this. Anything helps!

PERKS TO COME!

story:
LA HISTORIA

Monté la primera Vietparty cuando cumplí 25 años. En aquel entonces, no tenía ni idea de lo que acabaría siendo una Vietparty... tan solo quise montar una fiesta diferente, juntar a la gente que quería y compartir con ellos un día lleno de locura. El concepto enganchó a muchos y desde entonces mucha gente cada año me pide que la organice. Por desgracia, como pasa con las olimpiadas o el mundial de fútbol es imposible que haya una cada año. 

10 años después de la primera Vietparty, estoy organizando la cuarta edición... No te la pierdas o puede que no vivas otra hasta dentro de 5 años.

 

QUIERO QUE ESTÉS

Lo que no ha cambiado desde la primera edición, es que estas fiestas son especiales por la gente que asiste. Cuando juntas a mucha gente a la que quieres el resultado siempre es fantástico y emocionante. Si has recibido el link a esta página, significa que has sido invitado a la Vietparty y que sin duda alguna ¡te quiero y quiero que asistas!

 

LA FINANCIACIÓN

Para organizar esta fiesta he decidido volver a recurrir a un modelo de Crowdsourcing party, ¡como más recaudemos mejor será la fiesta!

Te pido que aportes para este día inolvidable. Será el mejor regalo de cumpleaños que podrás hacerme.

A tener en cuenta:

  • ¡¡¡He adelantado mucho dinero para que esta fiesta sea posible, no me quiero arruinar con 35 años!!!
  • Como más recaudemos más heavy será la fiesta... ¡Colabora!
  • Piensa en cuánto dinero te gastas en una noche de fiesta normal entre cena y copas... Esta fiesta será infinitamente mejor... ;)
  • Es imprescindible poner tu nombre y apellido en la aportación.

 

NUNCA VOLVEREMOS A VIVIR LA CUARTA VIETPARTY...


Para contribuir clica en la entrada que quieres en la columna derecha ---------------->

story:
Help Us Send The Late Randy Cole's (Parham) Son, Jesse To School of Rock in Tustin!

 

Anyone that knew Randy, knew that he had the complete rock star package. Good looks, guitar mastery and a great voice.  It is unfortunate that Randy will never have the chance to pass his musical legacy onto his 12 year old son, Jesse. But with your help, we can send Jesse to School of Rock in Tustin to pick things up where his Dad left them musically and help him continue the journey by learning to master guitar (and eventually learn to write and sing) and join a band of other students to rock with!  Give what you can, $5, $10, $25, $100 or the total $1,000, your support is appreciated and will positively affect Jesse's life. http://tustin.schoolofrock.com/

"You are transforming my child into someone who knows that she "can." She doesn't hope for the "I can" anymore - she KNOWS she can now. Our daughter is learning how to come out of herself, take risks, close her eyes and just fly. We are so grateful. More than you can ever know."

— Francine & Lou, Fort Washington, PA


What We Need & What You Get

  • We need to pay for 3 months of the School of Rock's Performance Program which costs $300 a month. The extra $100 will go towards paying for transportation twice a week to and from School of Rock in Tustin from Placentia where Jesse and his Mom, Wendy live.
  • What do you get? The satisfaction that you contributed to the development of a very talented kid that lost his father at a young age. You helped young Jesse find a healthy release to deal with the loss of his Dad and help find himself and express himself creatively through music!
  • When Jesse is playing guitar for the next Orange County band such as The Offspring, Blink 182, Social Distortion or No Doubt, remind him of your donation and hit him up for free concert tickets (Jesse, you better not get a big head and remember us little people!)

The Impact

School of Rock will give Jesse 1 hour of private guitar lessons (and eventually writing and voice lessons) and 3 hours of band practice with an assigned band consisting of other students.  The impact on Jesse will be that he will now have a creative outlet to express himself and grow as a young person. The loss of a father is a tough thing to anyone at any age. Jesse will learn how to work with others, taking on the responsibility of being in a band and not letting others down, and how to work as a team in being open minded and collaborating with others.  School of Rock is a national music instruction company and is recognized as a proven leader in teaching young people the art of music. The Tustin, CA location has produced some top notch musical talent, let's help make Jesse another successful musician that the school has produced!  http://www.youtube.com/user/SchoolofRockTustin

    Other Ways You Can Help

    Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

    • Help us get the word out and make some noise about our campaign to send Jesse to School of Rock in Tustin, CA.
    • Use the Indiegogo share tools to share with your family and friends!
    • We are going to be holding a fundraising car wash (Jesse will be scrubbing away to help his own cause) in Orange in late July, text Kurt Christian (619) 398-5139 or message me on Facebook if you want to volunteer to help us out. 

    Special thanks to Jon Parham, Bart & Julie Hike, Kent Christian, Jennifer Bayer, and Lori Quinn for helping out our cause already in some shape or form. 

    "Let's get this kid a rockin'!" - Kurt Christian, Organizer (Friend of the Parham Family Since 1979)

story:
Who We Are:

  • The Lyre Association of North America (LANA) has the mission of promoting the modern lyre, an instrument that has been in existence in its modern form for less than 100 years. We also promote the freed tone that is produced by the lyre and enhances our capacity for listening. We provide resources for lyre players, hold conferences, distribute publications (including music written especially for the lyre), and support lyre builders and teachers.

Our Campaign:  

  • We want to bring 30 more participants to our summer 2014 Lyre Conference featuring Hajime Kira from Tokyo, Japan. We wish to provide scholarships toward training, travel, venue, registration, and/or housing. We’re bringing teachers from around the country to the (American) Pacific Northwest to demonstrate how to use the lyre in early childhood classes, in hospitals, for loved ones who are ill, for the dying, and in performance.  We’d like lyrists and new people to come from all over to experience the lyre at this special event, and especially from the Northwest.

What We Need & What You Get:

  • We are looking for $5000 – to bring new lyre players to the Conference and to assist seasoned lyrists. 
  • All contributions are tax deductible donations. – We are a 501c3 and will send you a receipt identifying our EIN with your thank you note.
  • Please check out the "Perks" to see what we have to offer at various levels of donations.

What contributors will help us achieve:

  • LANA has mainly been able to reach East Coast players, so we feel the need to expand to new areas in North America.  We want the exposure in another region of North America.  It's the first time since LANA's inception that a lyre conference is in the Pacific Northwest.
  • Previous national conferences have featured singing and playing techniques taught by Europeans … or ourselves.  This conference is our first with a master lyrist from Asia helping us strive for the highest and most spiritual quality of lyre playing.

The Conference:

  • A typical day:  We will gather with Hajime for tone improvisation each day, then participate in a Master Class as a group, playing lyre and singing.  In the afternoons, we break up into different skill levels, which feature techniques to improve our listening and playing. There will also be Spacial Dynamics and singing sessions.  On one evening, we'll play favorite pieces that participants bring from home.  The conference features organic food and snacks and ends with a festive conclusion.  

  • It's a "lyre intensive," where our master teacher and other accomplished players work with beginners, "early stages" and intermediate players, and advanced lyrists from around the country.  All are working toward an Evening Musicale, sharing our lyre music on the last night of the conference with a Portland audience.  

Why the Lyre?

  • The modern lyre has a distinctive "freed tone"; the sound frees itself from the physical materials of the instrument and moves into the periphery around the listeners. Lyre tones do not "demand" our attention; rather, they invite us to listen more actively, with intention. Thinking of the social needs of our time, we can say that listening is a capacity that humanity desperately needs to cultivate and lift to a new and more conscious level. When we are enveloped by the warmth and light of the lyre tone, we are nourished. However, when these living tones are "reproduced" electronically, the spiritual being of the tone cannot be fully experienced. We invite you to be nourished by being personally and directly in the presence of a lyre as it is played!
  •  Rudolf Steiner, philosopher and seer of the early twentieth century, made the suggestions that were used for the building of the first modern lyre in 1926. He said that it will be necessary for humanity to develop a "musical listening capacity" to help us evolve to a higher and more loving level of consciousness. The lyre is a major carrier of that task.
  •  "When we dwell in music, we live in a reflection of our spiritual home....each time we listen to music, we sense deeply: 'Yes, I AM from another world!'" -R. Steiner, The Inner Nature of Music and the Experience of Tone

Hajime Kira: 

  • Hajime started his lyre training in Germany and returned to Japan. Now, because of him, Japan is a top location for lyre teaching and playing – he’s been a guest teacher at International Conferences in Europe, focusing on all aspects of lyre playing and tone production. His teaching style is unique, so we want to feature him and share him with North America!

Why It's Important:

  • This Conference is expensive:  shipping lyres to loan out, bringing a master lyrist from Japan, providing housing and catering, travel – all of these costs are more expensive than before.  We've kept registration fees low so members and friends can come, but without your help, we may not break even…
  • Your contribution, no matter how small, will help spread the word about the lyre and our work!
  • If 10 full paying people come, the operating expenses to bring our master lyre teacher will be covered, but other expenses will fall short. If we don’t reach our goal, fewer people will be offered scholarships. So, the more we raise, the more the participation.
  • We very much want this to be a success!

    Other Ways You Can Help

    Please help us:

    • Get the word out and make some noise about our campaign!
    • Tell your friends on Facebook and give them the link by email. 

    Thank you so much,

    The Conference Committee:  
    Rosamond Hughes, Sheila Johns,
    Margo Ketchum, Colleen Shetland, & Diane Rowley
story_txt:
Who We Are: 
The Lyre Association of
North America (LANA) has the mission of promoting the modern lyre, an
instrument that has been in existence in its modern form for less than 100
years. We also promote the freed tone that is produced by the lyre and enhances
our capacity for listening. We provide resources for lyre players, hold
conferences, distribute publications (including music written especially for
the lyre), and support lyre builders and teachers. 
Our Campaign:  

We want to bring 30 more participants to our summer 2014 Lyre Conference featuring Hajime Kira from Tokyo, Japan. We wish to provide
scholarships toward training, travel, venue, registration, and/or housing. We’re
bringing teachers from around the country to the (American) Pacific Northwest to demonstrate how to use the lyre in
early childhood classes, in hospitals, for loved ones who
are ill, for the dying, and in performance.  We’d like lyrists and new people to
come from all over to experience the lyre at this special event, and especially from the Northwest.



What We Need & What You Get:

We are looking for $5000 – to bring new lyre players to the Conference and to assist seasoned lyrists. 
All contributions are tax deductible donations. – We are a 501c3 and will send you a receipt identifying our EIN with your thank you note.
Please check out the "Perks" to see what we have to offer at various levels of donations.

What contributors will help us achieve:


LANA has mainly been able to reach East Coast players,
so we feel the need to expand to new areas in North America.  We want the exposure in another region of North America.  It's the first
time since LANA's inception that a lyre conference is in the Pacific Northwest.

Previous national conferences have featured singing and playing techniques taught by Europeans … or ourselves.  This conference is our first with a master lyrist from Asia helping us strive for the highest and most spiritual quality of lyre playing.

A typical day:  We will gather with Hajime for tone improvisation each day, then participate in a Master Class as a group, playing lyre and singing.  In the afternoons, we break up into different skill levels, which feature techniques to improve our listening and playing. There will also be Spacial Dynamics and singing sessions.  On one evening, we'll play favorite pieces that participants bring from home.  The conference features organic food and snacks and ends with a festive conclusion.  

It's a "lyre intensive," where our master teacher and other accomplished players work with beginners, "early stages" and intermediate players, and advanced lyrists from around the country.  All are working toward an Evening Musicale, sharing our lyre music on the last night of the conference with a Portland audience.  

Why the Lyre?

When we are enveloped by the warmth and light of the lyre tone, we are nourished. However, when these living tones are "reproduced" electronically, the spiritual being of the tone cannot be fully experienced. We invite you to be nourished by being personally and directly in the presence of a lyre as it is played!
 Rudolf Steiner, philosopher and seer of the early twentieth century, made the suggestions that were used for the building of the first modern lyre in 1926. He said that it will be necessary for humanity to develop a "musical listening capacity" to help us evolve to a higher and more loving level of consciousness. The lyre is a major carrier of that task.
 "When we dwell in music, we live in a reflection of our spiritual home....each time we listen to music, we sense deeply: 'Yes, I AM from another world!'" -R. Steiner, The Inner Nature of Music and the Experience of Tone



Hajime Kira: 



Hajime started his lyre training in Germany and returned to Japan. Now, because of him, Japan is a top location for lyre teaching and playing – he’s been a guest teacher at International Conferences in Europe, focusing on all aspects of lyre playing and tone production. His teaching style is unique, so we want to feature him and share him with North America!

  Why It's Important: 


This Conference is expensive:  shipping lyres to loan out, bringing a master lyrist from Japan, providing housing and catering, travel – all of these costs are more expensive than before.  We've kept registration fees low so members and friends can come, but without your help, we may not break even…


Your contribution, no matter how small, will help spread the word about the lyre and our work!

If 10 full paying people come, the operating expenses to bring our master lyre teacher will be covered, but other expenses will fall short. If we don’t reach our goal, fewer people will be offered scholarships. So, the more we raise, the more the participation.
We very much want this to be a success!



  Other Ways You Can Help Please help us: 
Get the word out and make some noise about our campaign!
Tell your friends on Facebook and give them the link by email. 
 
 Thank you so much,The Conference Committee:  Rosamond Hughes, Sheila Johns, Margo Ketchum, Colleen Shetland, & Diane Rowley

story:
NEWS: 14 days left! To celebrate the successful campaign we have opened the EPISODES I and II for free streaming for the last two weeks of the campaign!

The full album CD version includes these two episodes + unreleased EPISODE III including 3 new songs and + 3 extra songs! GO and get yours! 14 days starts now!
BEHIND THE BLACK VEIL EPISODES I & II- free stream!

________________________________________

One of the 3 extra songs on the physical CD "Behind the Black Veil" is "A grim Christmas Story"


_________________________________

PRE-HOHOHO! PRE- DINGDONG!

Christmas on it´s way! Would you like to give the "Behind the Black Veil " CD or something else from the campaign to someone as a Christmas present?

The CD won´t be out before Christmas eve and some items maybe take longer to ship too but WE HAVE A SOLUTION!!!!

- Order now from IGG http://igg.me/at/darksarah-episode3

- send an email to heidi.darksarah@gmail.com with a title CHRISTMAS from the same email address you gave on IGG with the info of your gift. Please remember to give us the right name and the address for whom we should send the gift to on IGG in the Shipping Information-part!

- When the campaign ends we will email you a designed, christmassy and colorful gift certificate that you can print out and wrap up for Christmas to your friend! The CD and perks will be sent as soon as they are ready.


____________________________________

A STRETCH GOAL!

We have almost reached our 5000€ goal, thanks to our great fans out there! So it is time to stretch our goal! If we can reach 10 000 € within the campaign time, DARK SARAH will reward her fans with an extra song sent digitally to the contributors! You can help us to reach more people - please share the word around! And remember, at the moment our full album is only available here on IGG - so if you want it now is your chance! THANK YOU AGAIN!


@Metal Female Voices Fest 2014

@Metal Female Voices Fest 2014  featuring  Zuberoa Aznarez (Diabulus in Musica)

LET ME TELL YOU ABOUT DARK SARAH

The ones who don´t know me yet my name is Heidi Parviainen, I´m a classical singer from Finland. But you may know me better from by previous band, Amberian Dawn. In 2012 our path together came to its´ end. Back then I already knew I wanted to make something different, something that would not maybe be so "radio friendly" but would create a whole new world around music, music that would combine elements of film music and metal music and even some music theater too. And so I started a very ambitious project, DARK SARAH, where all the elements: music, story, videos, photos etc. would support each other like in a good movie.

DARK SARAH´s DEBUT ALBUM CALLED "BEHIND THE BLACK VEIL...

....is a concept album. It follows a certain story line and tells a story of a young woman called Sarah who after a personal trauma changes to her evil side persona - DARK SARAH. (Read more here)

The album will be published digitally in 3 episodes and the complete album as a CD version too. The EPISODE´s I and II got full funding here on Indiegogo. Thanks to your contributors we have made it so far! Only the last part, EPISODE III, is missing and THEN THE ALBUM IS READY! We need your help to make the story complete.

Listen to the samples of episodes I and II :


EPISODE I:

Save me, Poison Apple, Hide and Seek, Memories Fall

EPISODE II:

Evil Roots, Violent Roses, Hunting the Dreamer, Fortress

THE EPISODE III will bring you...

...the EPILOGUE, the conclusion part of the short trilogy of "Behind the Black Veil".

Where the EPISODE I represented the more solitude and melancholic side of Sarah and the EPISODE II  celebrated the remorseless and cruel Dark Sarah, now there is again something new and exciting coming up both musically and in the story!  The EPISODE III will include 3 NEW cinematic metal songs! And the CD version +3 extra songs.

All the EPISODES have real stars in them - musicians and artists who have given their talent to help Dark Sarah to take her first steps and singers who have given their voice to play a role in the story: EPISODE I is starred by Manuela Kraller (ex - Xandria), EPISODE II is starred by Inga Scharf and Van Canto. EPISODE III will be starred by Tony Kakko (Sonata Arctica) in a duet with Sarah!

Let me also introduce you Dark Sarah´s official lineup! In guitars Erkka Korhonen and Sami-Petri Salonen, in bass Rude Rothstén and in drums Lauri Kuussalo.

Music videos:



INDIE GOGO CAMPAIGN Nr3

Now Dark Sarah needs your help to fund the last part of the album, EPISODE III. We are new comers in the music scene and work without a label, your support is what counts! On our previous Indie GoGo Campaign´s your generous contributions brought us victorious full funding for the EPISODE´s I and II! Thank you! This time we would need your help again to reach 5000€ to cover the costs of recording, mixing and arranging the music and purchasing the sold perks.

WANT TO BECOME A DREAM TEAM MEMBER?

We have put a great amount of perks here for you to choose from. Every perk includes shipping costs and the digital download of the EPISODE III. Most of the perks are collectors editions that you can´t get anywhere else. 

Here are the perks: please choose a perk, we cant accept donations :( 






By contributing you will get:

- Your name on the physical album thank you list and the digital thank you list on our website.

- Your perk! + EPISODE III mp3 download link +pdf booklet!

- A DREAM TEAM diploma sent to you digitally or physically by snail mail (depending on your perk)

- A happy mind!

PLEASE CHOOSE A PERK OF YOUR WISH, CONTRIBUTE AND BECOME A DARK SARAH DREAM TEAM MEMBER!

You can also help us by sharing word about Dark Sarah in the social media! Thank you in advance for your help!


Dark Sarah
